sentences.sCn: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.sContent: ...We worry most about now because if we don't survive for the next minute...
...looking for a job to survive another day...
...and I moved from Manhattan to rural Japan in part so I could more easily survive for long stretches entirely on foot...
...human activities have changed the way turtles survive...

remMethod.val: sur(在…下面) ＋ viv(生命) ＋ e → 在废墟下面活下来 → 活下来

words.tran: 继续存在的；未死的；依然健在的
幸存，残存；幸存者，残存物
活命主义者；成功地活下来的人

trans.tranCn: 活下来，继续存在；幸免于
trans.tranOther: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

trans.tranCn: 从中挺过来； 从…逃出； 比…活得长
trans.tranOther: to continue to live normally in spite of many problems
